A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Its time...... for the franchise..... to end.

It has ended for me at least: "Star Wars: The Last Straw" killed any remaining love or hope I had for the franchise. I'm done. I'm out. And I'm taking my hard-earned $'s with me.

The sad thing is that Disney CAN afford to ruin Star Wars: They own Marvel... Pixar... ESPN... ABC... 21st Century Fox... and of course\, LucasFilm. 
They CAN afford to pay off critics. 
They CAN pay off Rotten Tomatoes to freeze the audience score at 49% (even though its clearly far lower).
They CAN afford to push political agendas without worrying about backlash. 

But for what its worth\, they won't be doing it with my money. I'm boycotting the Solo film\, episode IX and every other piece of crap they stick a SW label on.

Over and out.
